How to set custom bitrates on firmware 1.7.8 in autoexec.ash. See the bitrate_mod directory for an example.

To set a custom bitrate for a resolution do:
writew [address] [bitrate]

ex:
writew 0xA06512DE 0x42AC
makes 3840x2160 30p high quality setting encode at 90mbs

bitrates (you can pick values in between or above these for fine tuning):
0x4190 18mbs
0x41F0 30mbs
0x4210 36mbs
0x4220 40mbs
0x4234 45mbs
0x4270 60mbs
0x4284 70mbs
0x4298 80mbs
0x42AC 90mbs
0x42C8 100mbs
0x42D4 110mbs
0x42E8 120mbs
0x42FC 130mbs
0x4306 140mbs
0x4310 150mbs
0x431A 160mbs

(120mbs works if your card is fast enough, the camera crashes if 150mbs is used 
for more than like 3 seconds. If you want to properly test if your card can 
handle a bitrate you need to test for more than a few minutes preferably 
recording lots of motion. If you get a slow sd card error it means your sd card 
is too slow and that the camera stopped recording for a few seconds in order to 
catch up)


addresses for high quality bitrate (+0x10 = medium, +0x20 = low):

NTSC:
0xA06512DE 3840x2160 30P 16:9
0xA065130E 3840x2160 24P 16:9
0xA065133E 3840x2160 24P 16:9 super
0xA065136E 2976x2976 30P 1:1
0xA065139E 2688x2688 30P 1:1
0xA06513CE 2704x1520 60P 16:9
0xA06513FE 2704x1520 30P 16:9
0xA065142E 2704x1520 48P 16:9
0xA065145E 2704x1520 24P 16:9
0xA065148E 2704x1520 30P 16:9 super
0xA06514BE 2704x2032 30P 4:3
0xA06514EE 2560x1920 30P 4:3
0xA065151E 2560x1440 60P 16:9
0xA065154E 2560x1440 30P 16:9
0xA065157E HDR 2560x1440 30P 16:9
0xA06515AE 2304x1296 30P 16:9
0xA06515DE 1920x1440 60P 4:3
0xA065160E 1920x1440 30P 4:3
0xA065163E 1920x1440 48P 4:3
0xA065166E 1920x1440 24P 4:3
0xA065169E 1920x1080 60P 16:9
0xA06516CE 1920x1080 60P 16:9 super
0xA06516FE 1920x1080 45P 16:9
0xA065172E 1920x1080 40P 16:9
0xA065175E 1920x1080 30P 16:9
0xA065178E 1920x1080 30P 16:9 super
0xA06517BE HDR 1920x1080 30P 16:9
0xA06517EE 1920x1080 60I 16:9
0xA065181E 1440x1080 60P 16:9
0xA065184E 1440x1080 30P 16:9
0xA065187E 1440x1080 60I 16:9
0xA06518AE 1600x1200 60P 4:3
0xA06518DE 1600x1200 30P 4:3
0xA065190E 1440x1080 30P 4:3
0xA065193E 1600x900 30P 16:9
0xA065196E 1280x720 60P 16:9
0xA065199E 1280x720 60P 16:9 super
0xA06519CE 1280x720 30P 16:9
0xA06519FE 848x480 60P 16:9
0xA0651A2E 848x480 30P 16:9
0xA0651A5E 848x480 30P 16:9 super
0xA0651A8E 848x480 60P 16:9 super
0xA0651ABE 720x480 60P 16:9
0xA0651AEE 720x480 30P 4:3
0xA0651B1E 1280x960 60P 4:3
0xA0651B4E 1280x960 30P 4:3
0xA0651B7E 960x540 30P 16:9
0xA0651BAE 640x360 30P 16:9
0xA0651BDE 640x480 60P 4:3
0xA0651C0E 640x480 30P 4:3
0xA0651C3E 432x240 60P 16:9
0xA0651C6E 432x240 30P 16:9
0xA0651C9E 320x240 30P 4:3
0xA0651CCE 352x240 30P 4:3
0xA0651CFE 2560x1440 50P 16:9
0xA0651D2E 1920x1080 48P 16:9
0xA0651D5E 1920x1080 24P 16:9
0xA0651D8E 1920x1080 15P 16:9
0xA0651DBE 1600x1200 48P 4:3
0xA0651DEE 1600x1200 24P 4:3
0xA0651E1E 1280x960 48P 4:3
0xA0651E4E 1280x960 24P 4:3
0xA0651E7E 1280x720 48P 16:9
0xA0651EAE 1280x720 24P 16:9
0xA0651EDE 848x480 48P 16:9
0xA0651F0E 848x480 24P 16:9
0xA0651F3E 640x480 48P 4:3
0xA0651F6E 640x480 24P 4:3
0xA0651F9E Precise
0xA0651FCE 1920x1080 120P 16:9
0xA0651FFE 1920x1080 120P 16:9 super
0xA065202E 1920x1080 100P 16:9
0xA065205E 1280x720 240P 16:9
0xA065208E 1280x720 200P 16:9
0xA06520BE 1280x720 120P 16:9
0xA06520EE 1280x720 120P 16:9 super
0xA065211E 848x480 240P 16:9
0xA065214E 848x480 120P 16:9
0xA065217E 848x480 90P 16:9 super
0xA06521AE 848x480 120P 16:9 super
0xA06521DE 640x480 240P 4:3
0xA065220E 640x480 120P 4:3
0xA065223E 432x240 240P 16:9
0xA065226E 432x240 120P 16:9
0xA065229E 320x240 120P 4:3
0xA06522CE 1280x960 120P 4:3
0xA06522FE 1920x1080 90P 16:9 super

PAL:
0xA06512DE 3840x2160 25P 16:9
0xA065130E 3840x2160 24P 16:9
0xA065133E 3840x2160 24P 16:9 super
0xA065136E 2976x2976 25P 1:1
0xA065139E 2688x2688 25P 1:1
0xA06513CE 2704x1520 50P 16:9
0xA06513FE 2704x1520 25P 16:9

0xA065154E 2560x1440 25P 16:9

0xA065166E 1920x1440 24P 4:3

0xA06516CE 1920x1080 50P 16:9 super
0xA06516FE 1920x1080 45P 16:9
0xA065172E 1920x1080 40P 16:9

0xA06517EE 1920x1080 50I 16:9
0xA065181E 1440x1080 50P 16:9
0xA065184E 1440x1080 25P 16:9
0xA065187E 1440x1080 50I 16:9
0xA06518AE 1600x1200 50P 4:3
0xA06518DE 1600x1200 25P 4:3
0xA065190E 1440x1080 25P 4:3
0xA065193E 1600x900 25P 16:9
0xA065196E 1280x720 50P 16:9
0xA065199E 1280x720 50P 16:9 super
0xA06519CE 1280x720 25P 16:9

0xA0651AEE 720x480 25P 4:3
0xA0651B1E 1280x960 50P 4:3
0xA0651B4E 1280x960 25P 4:3

0xA0651BAE 640x360 25P 16:9

0xA0651C0E 640x480 25P 4:3
0xA0651C3E 432x240 50P 16:9
0xA0651C6E 432x240 25P 16:9
0xA0651C9E 320x240 25P 4:3
0xA0651CCE 352x240 25P 4:3
0xA0651CFE 2560x1440 60P 16:9
0xA0651D2E 1920x1080 48P 16:9
0xA0651D5E 1920x1080 24P 16:9
0xA0651D8E 1920x1080 15P 16:9

0xA0651DEE 1600x1200 24P 4:3

0xA0651E4E 1280x960 24P 4:3
0xA0651E7E 1280x720 48P 16:9
0xA0651EAE 1280x720 24P 16:9
0xA0651EDE 848x480 48P 16:9
0xA0651F0E 848x480 24P 16:9
0xA0651F3E 640x480 48P 4:3
0xA0651F6E 640x480 24P 4:3
0xA0651F9E Precise
0xA0651FCE 1920x1080 100P 16:9
0xA0651FFE 1920x1080 100P 16:9 super
0xA065202E 1920x1080 100P 16:9
0xA065205E 1280x720 200P 16:9
0xA065208E 1280x720 200P 16:9
0xA06520BE 1280x720 100P 16:9
0xA06520EE 1280x720 100P 16:9 super
0xA065211E 848x480 200P 16:9
0xA065214E 848x480 100P 16:9
0xA065217E 848x480 90P 16:9 super
0xA06521AE 848x480 100P 16:9 super
0xA06521DE 640x480 200P 4:3
0xA065220E 640x480 100P 4:3
0xA065223E 432x240 200P 16:9
0xA065226E 432x240 100P 16:9
0xA065229E 320x240 100P 16:9
0xA06522CE 1280x960 100P 4:3
0xA06522FE 1920x1080 90P 16:9 super

The resolution/bitrate table is located in /dev/mtdblock1 at position 
0x005512D8. This entire partition gets loaded into memory at boot at offset 
0xA0100000.
